TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataAttribute extends NUnit.Framework.NUnitAttribute

Docs.summary: The abstract base class for all data-providing attributes defined by NUnit. Used to select all data sources for a method, class or parameter.
